pros: 4K video and 10MP photography with waterproof design
The Session's small size may make it more appealing to some users
cons: Lower photo quality than some others

customer_reviews.title: Have a motorcycle? Get this. Now.
customer_reviews.text: After a motorcycle accident in which there were no witnesses other than myself and the guy who hit me, I decided a GoPro would be a worthwhile purchase. Having used it for a few days in my daily commute, the peace of mind this little camera gives me is easily worth the price. It's easy to use, super portable and the video it captures is great quality. It's new essential equipment for motorcycle riders nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: zenprism

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome though, I mounted it to a helmet and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a techy gadget guy, this is my first GoPro. This thing is awesome though, I mounted it to a helmet and with a 128GB card and a 10A battery pack (Anker, if you want to know) mounted into the counterweight pouch on the back, I can record in 1080 for around 8 hours... with a 1 inch cube! How cool is that??
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was a good product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get it mounted and the camera quit working. Gets extremely hot and won't function. Shut it down and it stays hot. very disappointed was looking forward to using this on my kayak. Looks good, but looks aren't everything.
customer_reviews.author: SPR

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a GoPro that meets expectations! I previously purchased a Hero + LCD, and a Hero 4 Black. Neither of those cameras worked very well, would overheat easily, and die quickly (average run time for 1080/60fps was <40 minutes). Just in the last day, the image quality, battery life, etc. have all impressed me. The camera has been used to do a time-lapse of an engine teardown/rebuild I'm doing, as well as driving around town. If there's anything I don't like about the camera, it's the general operation, but that's just a product of being used to the regular GoPro, so I'm sure that won't be an issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better
customer_reviews.text: 1) The camera stops recording for no apparent reason. Battery is fine, plenty of room on the SIM card. Getting it to start recording again is a bother. You're never sure what you've missed. 2) The battery runs down even when you've shut the camera off. Every time you pick it up to use it, count on the battery being dead. 3) There is no way to turn off "chaptering". Sometimes you get a fairly long recording and other times it's chopped up into many little files you have to reassemble into one video. And yes, I updated the firmware. As far as I'm concerned I wasted $200.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great images and videos but voice control needs a LOT of work
customer_reviews.text: Use primarily as surgeon on OR. First GoPro. Nice mounts. Great picture and video quality. Voice control is very bad. Had to turn off and purchase a REMO which is better and allows me to place closer to my mouth. Wants to switch between modes (video vs. time lapse) if not careful. Would be perfect if voice commands were better. Also, editing software crashes when trying to view or edit video...use Windows Media Player to watch but editing not so easy.
customer_reviews.author: SAL

customer_reviews.title: and then is PERFECT product.
customer_reviews.text: It's GREATS. But... heats with much continuous use. and then is PERFECT product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love gopro products and this camera is great. The only slight problem is that when charging, you have to move the charger a certain way for it to work. A pain but tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Grady G

customer_reviews.title: 11 Videos Made - All of Them Terrible
customer_reviews.text: No matter the settings, all videos made so far are horrible. Unusable under any circumstances. Grainy. Pixelated garbage. There is zero difference between any of the different settings. Yes. Protune is turned on. Yes. I've tried several SD cards. Yes. I've tried to change all the different settings. Yes. I've watched numerous videos on YouTube. All the videos look the same. TERRIBLE!!! I'm hoping I just got a lemon. I'll be returning for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: No Regrets

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life especially in the cool. Great video quality.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very poor and the camera is hard to control and non responsive when using voice control it kept going into burst mode when I didn't ask it to. The rest of the features are as advertised. I has great video quality I gave it 4 stars because of it video quality I will have to carry a battery to charge it and turn off voice command and just use the phone app..
customer_reviews.author: Justthefacts

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like what I expected from all the hype
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera and sturdy, but wow, the 4GB split of way too big video files is ridiculous - way too hard to move across media, way too big for what I need. It is hard to lower the size without losing a lot of the depth of field and other qualities. It is terrible in dark situations in general. I bought it for more static usage, but it's not great for that as well. Overly not satisfied with the expected greatness of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great features, beautiful video, battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: the battery life is a little unpredictable. Obviously it will vary depending on the resolution, frame rate, and so on, but I can't seem to nail down exactly how much time I'm getting on a full charge. Sometimes I open the case, it's at 100%, I use it for 10 minutes and the app says it's down to 70%. other times I run it for half an hour and i"m still at 90%. Overall, great camera for the price, very versatile and light weight. The battery life matches the pricepoint I suppose. Just get a USB power bank for a backup!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: descent camera
customer_reviews.text: So, this is a pretty good action cam. The camera is easy to use. The software is pretty easy to figure out if you've used any photo/video editing program before. The image quality is fine for everything I do. My only complaint is that it doesn't have a removable battery AND I seem to be able to drain the battery at a pretty fast pace. In retrospect a hero 5 black probably would have been better for how I use it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Good, small camera. Everything else is kind of bad
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is an issue as others have said. App is kind of bad, slow, buggy. Requires an account and keeps pushing ads for apps and services. Some settings are only accessible through the app. Even if you get an SD card with a modern file system, it will still chop up videos into 4GB chunks. Video quality is good, sound quality really bad. FWIW I'm filming my bicycling. No image stabilization at 4K resolution and max 30FPS at 4K. Mounts are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: ​

customer_reviews.title: this product and company is garbage
customer_reviews.text: i have the hero 5 session. it won't stay on. i can't communicate with it. the desktop app will not function unless you sign up with them to get an account. i do NOT want them to know who i am. i just want to use the camera. to fix the issue that it won't stay on you need to download an update. you can't do that unless you register with them so they can bombard you with how wonderful they are not. bottom line, the camera doesn't work & the company spends more time demanding to know you so they can market to you than creating a good experience. i will never buy another product from them again.
customer_reviews.author: patanne

customer_reviews.title: Received as ordered but doesn't work properly. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as ordered but doesn't work properly. I have reinstalled the firmware countless times and used different micro SD cards but not working still. An expensive dud. Any way to return or exchange?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its not that easy to just figure this camera out
customer_reviews.text: If I'm going to buy a piece if electronic equipment, it should come with instructions! Its not that easy to just figure this camera out! I downloaded instructions, but i am beyond frustrated. I would have liked to have been able to use it right away...Very discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There's better features on the Hero.
customer_reviews.text: Like: size, um... Guess that's it. Dislike: GoPro update that stops mic use with quick capture button. $50 mic adapter. Need to use app, turn on, link, then plug in mic adapter, use app to record. Always test before heading off. Battery life is bad. Really bad 50 degrees and below. The GoPro app always gets on my nerves. I would have gone with a Hero is I knew what I know today.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Steele

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy and packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: I love how small and easy to operate this GoPro is. It’s a necessity for me, I throw it in my bag, car, and or pocket and use as needed. You will need to make sure you have a charger for it and keep it on you at all times. The battery life is horrible, but the picture is great. Overall this is a must have for anyone wanting a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Ambient temperature problems?
customer_reviews.text: Seems to overheat and shut down in about 15 minutes in south Forida over 80 degrees in the sun. Battery when it was cooler dead in two hours taking time lapse photos. Have not been able to get on the same page as voice control.
customer_reviews.author: RNH

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: A very disappointing product. Battery life is very short under common temperatures, and the battery has a quick shelf-discharge (it does not maintain a charge if fully charged and left unused).You basically must have it on the charger until tight before you use it -- but don't leave it on the charger too long, because is gets into a frozen state where it is unusable. The wifi/cloud upload function is also very slow and flakey. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't, and there is no pattern to the behavior. I bought this camera for its size and the expectation of gopro functionality, but it does not deliver. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: KurtSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect shape and he loves it so much he got ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. Arrived in perfect shape and he loves it so much he got a second one. He has a private pilots lic. and uses it when he flies. I love the videos!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I was slightly concerned about some of the negative reviews sound like people didn't read the directions. There's a bit of initial setup. However this one is connected to Samsung Galaxy 6+ 7 & 8+ and it works great. I'm not having any issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this to work. Came with no directions so I tried following youtube videos. Kept getting to a point in the videos where the hero would not give me the options to proceed with set up. Did not return because I blamed my own lack of technical expertise. Finally gave it to my son who is tech competent and had used one before -- but he couldn't get it to work either. Maybe we're both stupid but even if we are; this is not a user friendly product and they are lying when they tell you it's an easy set up. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: barry bergen

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use and intuitive.  Take time to figure it out before using on your adventure.
customer_reviews.text: Took my gopro on a trip and hit the record button, button shows time ticking by but when I get back home all I have are snapshots, not video. Huh? I guess it is possible to switch modes but why would snapshot be default? Expensive mistake to make, now goes into the junk drawer with all the other tech that over promised and under delivered.
customer_reviews.author: nothinghead

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam, the gold standard for freestyle quadcopters.
customer_reviews.text: I love these cams... It's sad that the Session line is discontinued now because this is a great camera. It's the perfect size/shape to fit 4"-7" quads so it has become the gold standard for freestyle footage. 2.7k 30fps superview is excellent for YouTube videos and the sound is really good (better than the Hero4 Session, too). Any minor jello you may get can be mitigated with a neutral density filter, this is especially useful if you're not using fresh props every time you fly.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!!! So hot you cannot touch it, and it shuts itself off.
customer_reviews.text: Camera gets so hot when using that it shuts itself off. You cannot even touch it because it is so hot. Also gets very hot while charging. After looking in to it, it seems to be an ongoing issue that GoPro is aware of. They should stop selling the cameras until the issue is solved. Do not buy this camera until GoPro says they have fixed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Callen Herring

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun and great portability
customer_reviews.text: The session is great, it's nice and small and the video quality is really good. I have GoPro Hero 5 and 4 silver as well and this fits in perfectly with them. You can just throw it in your pocket and have it whenever you want. Once you get used to scrolling through the modes or using the app to control it, it works great. Only drawback it the sound is recorded in mono and not stereo, but for how small it is that's not a huge thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alky1229

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and good video
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Gets the job done when you're mounting it to a helmet or bicycle. Works well with gimbals too. The only real issue is the inability to turn it on without it starting to record immediately. I understand where GoPro was coming from when implementing on/off this way, but it's counterintuitive to their other products, i.e. Hero5 Black. Just takes some getting used to. The size is perfect for just throwing it in your pocket and pulling it out when you want to capture a quick candid shot or an unexpected photo/video opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small & Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wasn't disappointed and I could see why people love to use GoPro. Session has no monitor, but the phone app works very well, making the phone screen functions as one. I have also taken cool pictures with the camera. Of course it cannot compete with real cameras, but it works just fine when you want to go light-weight. The battery life isn't very long, but it is just as advertised, about 90 minutes or so if recording.
customer_reviews.author: Hsinju

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. It's still too cold where I am to ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's still too cold where I am to do anything amazing with it, but I have had a lot of fun recording and taking pictures of random stuff. The only thing I recommend is that you check your phone version to make sure the app is compatible. I ended up having to install a custom ROM on my Galaxy S5 because it wold not update to anything higher than Android 4.4.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great but battery suffers in cold.
customer_reviews.text: Like most go pro cameras the battery doesn’t do that well in the cold. I got maybe 10 min of video when cold but the other features work great. Get the battery expansion and you should do better. I knew this going into it and still am pretty satisfied because i got the battery expansion.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: better mic than my Sonys (doesn't pick up the heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: More discreet than my Sonys, better mic than my Sonys (doesn't pick up the heavy breathing as much), and connects to my phone much more reliably than my Sonys. Also, love the advanced options available in the phone menu and the option to be able to turn off the lights and beep. The only thing I could hope for in future versions is increased image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great value and functionality for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great value and functionality for my needs. It takes a little learning to figure out the menus without a screen, but eventually you can get the hang of it. I had a little trouble updating the firmware, but GoPro tech support was great. This is a great addition to my Hero5 Black. I can control both simultaneously with one Smart Remote and get some great multi-cam shots.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lundgren Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Generally happy!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is still not GoPro’s strong point. Love the size, went on a hike with the session mounted on my camera bag strap and it was never in the way. My only real complaint about GoPro is, how hard is it to put a standard tripod mount on the bottom of the camera like everyone else. Makes mounting this camera annoying at times as it needs extra parts to share mounts with my Nikon and Sony cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hite

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, half-baked software.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is excellent for the form factor. I barrel mount it on my Paintball gun. The mobile app for managing the settings is also very functional. I dinged it a star because gopro's PC/Mac video editing software is just garbage. The lack of good or, functional editing software for what the gorpo user is doing really holds back the platform. Being able to quickly clip and stitch footage cripples the experience.
customer_reviews.author: DMO

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera needs a better external mic alternative
customer_reviews.text: GoPro needs to make an external mic adapter that isn’t a brick! Please convert the current mic adaptor to a nice small compact device that doesn’t take up valuable aerodynamics on a Motorcycle Helmet. C’mon guys you know that thousands of Motorcycle riders use these cameras daily and a small 10 pin or 15 pin external mic would be great for about $10.00
customer_reviews.author: Ocoeejak

customer_reviews.title: My first GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny but it does its job. I wish it take 4K pictures though. The stabilization mode helps a lot with taking vdo but it kills battery so fast. With no screen, it’s hard to see if you have good pictures or not. Well it may be for pre-pro vloggers that’s for sure. The fact that it doesn’t have timer to take pictures make it hard to take selfie with not having to connect to your phone. Anyway I’m just a beginner anyway so still learning. Pictures and vdo are very good though, at least standardized enough.
customer_reviews.author: King Thipachan Boualapheth

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, battery life less than I would like
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. Have used it some, plan to use it a lot more. Outdoors is great. If used indoors, you need to turn on all the lights to avoid grainy videos. I only gave it 4 stars because the battery just goes dead when you store the camera. You need to charge it up before using it again. But, that aside, I plan to get lots of use out of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: (Unit Replaced by GoPro) Water Damage after first time recording my swim stroke in pool
customer_reviews.text: (Being replaced by GoPro)Stopped working during my first use in pool. At first I thought it ran out of power since the battery compartment was dry and no water in LCD. Later condensation formed on the inside as shown. Placed under water about 18 inches so way less than the claimed 30'. What little footage I got did look good, but I only had this 2 weeks!!! I think the small size is great though it appears most people prefer the bigger heighier version with a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Arnott

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, but not foolproof
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Customer service was fast and friendly. They got me a replacement camera for absolutely no charge. Really impressed with that. I will consider buying from them in the future strictly based on my customer service experience. Clunky and overall a poor design. I eventually forgot to close the charging bay before going in the water and now it won't turn on. Partly my fault, but they could've designed it so that by default it is closed. They also could've made it so the SD slot was separately accessible which would've guaranteed better waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ward

customer_reviews.title: product had problems
customer_reviews.text: first of all the battery wouldnt hold a charge even when it wasn't being used. I took this camera on a once in a lifetime mountain adventure and when i tryed to transfer the videos to my computer the computer said the devise connected is malfunctioning and it could'nt download the files.
customer_reviews.author: wendy aubert

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our annual trip to Maui. Great camera. Put it on enclosed face snorkel and video recorded fish. Also purchased a floating handle w/ wrist strap for it when going in the ocean but not snorkeling. Waterproof and excellent picture. Not as much fish-eye as my previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera Very compatible Easy to use Great videos Pictures are not so good 10mp Video stabilization is amazing (only in 1080p$
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this camera. Has great quality video and seems very sturdy. The small size lets you mount this thing practically anywhere. This is perfect for mounting on things that are either attached to you or attached to things you hold. The small size is good for not adding a lot of bulk to whatever you're wearing/holding. The lack of a removable battery is slightly disappointing, though.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Workman

customer_reviews.title: Don't Wait! Buy It! Trust Me, You'll Be Glad You Did, I was and AM GLAD I Did!
customer_reviews.text: If you know ANYTHING about GoPro, you know that you simply can't go wrong with any purchase. The functions for me took a little to get use to. I'm still learning the nuances and Loving Every Minute of The Process! I will make another purchase very soon. I purchased the JOBY GorillaPod also as you can see by the attached pic., sorry for the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Steven Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The videos are clear and fun to watch. I have only tested it so far, as I am in SW florida and there is not much to see, other than the everglades, which are beautiful in their own right, but better walking. I am headed back to Barbados in the middle of May, and I will have plenty of the Caribbean to put on video. I have had my routine bicycle rides around Barbados for several years, and friends have been pushing me for some time to get videos, so now I will.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: False Advertisement! Had this GoPro session 5 less than a week and the camera is NOT waterproof!!! My son tested it in the bathroom sink and air bubbles came up from the Memory Card door?! He immediately took it out and dried it off and it still works. Then, he used it to take video while riding his bike and the camera gets so hot that you can't even hold it. Don't bother with this product
customer_reviews.author: Garlic

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera. Battery life sucks though
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this product is ts biggest downfall. Maybe an hour if you are lucky. Fully charged in temps -6F died in less than 30 seconds with a full charge. If I could do it again I would go with one that has a removable battery that I can keep warm in my pocket
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Versatile camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera - I mounted it on the roof of my car when I drove to Key West. I like the interface to my tablet so I can see what the camera is recording :-)
customer_reviews.author: Charles H Rothauser

customer_reviews.title: A GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Not purchased for myself but for my son as a b day gift. He loves it and takes it on all his outdoor adventures. ATV riding dirtbike riding fishing hunting you name it hes got it on. The only issue is the long uploading time of his vids to his youtube page but he manages. Worlds greatest mom and dad for this years 12th birthday. Thanks amazon and go pro
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! It was the real thing. Everything works well and is easy to navigate especially using the app on your phone. It does drain battery quicker when using the protune setting and when connected to a device so keep that in mind. Also great in the water and audio is good right out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best 300$ I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Best 300$ I've ever spent! I've used it tied in my car during racing event, or when snorkling or even just playing in the pool. It's a very nice camera! I wish battery life was a bit longer, but I've yet to run out of battery though!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This little POV camera is great. Its small size allows you to slip it in your pocket. Voice control is awesome and with excellent stabilization. I have had this thing mounted and it was bouncing al over the place. I was sure the video would be toast. Nope it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t last long, difficult to configure on the fly. Takes a while to connect to on phone and they should’ve put something by the microphone to reduce wind noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ari312

customer_reviews.title: Old but still great technology
customer_reviews.text: Good but you need adapter and mic sound record sucks. I’ve had session (stolen) and a black 7 (unbelievably smooth stabilition and better sound but you still need a mic and adapter )..... this is still my favourite for tripod video
customer_reviews.author: Richard Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a pilot and I got this for him for Christmas and it is wonderful. We have a lot of amazing footage that he was able to get on his Landings takeoffs and during his flights. Great quality picture and easily controlled
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: The process took a while but my new camera arrived and is working great. Overall I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the new camera sent..contacted GoPro and after a few conversations via email..they agreed to replace it. The process took a while but my new camera arrived and is working great. Overall I love this camera..small, light weight, lots of features, waterproof without an additional case, and the voice activation worked well for me. I recommend this little gem for your vacation.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: My first GoPro. Very basic and a little weighty on my bike helmet. It is small but still very noticeable on my head. I am not sure your can do better. But this is my honest opinion. Picture is good though. That is the highlight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: box not sealed when received and no serial number
customer_reviews.text: the item box was clearly opened when received, the embedded tape was peeled out and another tape was reapplied to make it looks like new. Also, the white square that serial number is printed is missing! moreover, what proves that the box was opened is the position of HERO5 brand (gray) is supposed to be aligned with front of camera but as shown in attached photos!
customer_reviews.author: baraheas

customer_reviews.title: I love this little baby
customer_reviews.text: I love this little baby!! For the price this camera is perfect. Very portable and so light! Low light video is not great but it's very easy to use and has great battery life. I bought this for a music fest and am blown away with the sound quality I got in all my videos!!
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Smaller is better!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smaller size of the hero and the battery lasts forever. Had a blast with this in Europe, only needed one charge in 2 weeks. Small means you can discretely video experiences. Used Quick Stories to easily publish our adventures. This unit was so easy my husband could use it!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Rogowsky

customer_reviews.title: its a cool little device
customer_reviews.text: Picture not as robust as the fullsize GoPro. You can tell the difference in resolution when you switch shots or scenes while editing. Other than that, its a cool little device. Battery life seems better compared to the fullsize as well.
customer_reviews.author: Papertiger

customer_reviews.title: The low light quality is much better, the 4K is beautiful and the white balance ...
customer_reviews.text: A real step up from the Hero 4 Session. The low light quality is much better, the 4K is beautiful and the white balance looks so much better than the Hero 4 Session. The only downside is the battery life, which is the same and possibly slightly worse. I've heard issues about the camera locking up and overheating, no lockups so far. It does get hot, but not scorching like people say, no hotter than my Hero 4 Session ever got.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz Medina

customer_reviews.title: but these little go pro cubes are my favorite. press one button once and off you go
customer_reviews.text: there are a lot of action cameras out there, but these little go pro cubes are my favorite. press one button once and off you go! brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at 1080p60 with stabilization
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at 1080p60 with stabilization, but youtube always downgrades it so much I am forced to record in 4k 30 FPS so it doesn't get pixelated and compressed after uploading. Also the files sizes are huge compared to other 4k or 1080p60 video files...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A decent POV camera
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Durable. Variable shooting modes. Image stabilization. Connects to an app on your phone for easier setting changes. Water proof (although I've never tried it). Cons: Lack of zoom, battery life (1 hr).
customer_reviews.author: M. Torrey

customer_reviews.title: GoPro needs to make these again.
customer_reviews.text: I love these little cameras. I wish GoPro would get their head out of their a**es and sell the session form-factor cameras again. They are basically the only and best GoPro camera for FPV and many other feather-light activities.
customer_reviews.author: badfish

customer_reviews.title: Used unit sold as new
customer_reviews.text: This is a used or refurbished unit. None of the protective skin is on the deviceas my previous units and the box is missing the locking tape. This is a retail package that has been opened. Not as advertised or priced.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Other then that I love the camera
customer_reviews.text: The plastic mount/housing that comes with the camera broke after a couple uses. I had to purchase an aluminum housing and mount for my bike. Other then that I love the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Doug138

customer_reviews.title: GoPro at the top of their game!
customer_reviews.text: The form factor in the image quality is beyond comparison... The only thing that stops IT from having five stars is the fact that the battery will run out in less than an hour if you are over 1080p in video recording... The voice control is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: TPS

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge and display screen will not light up after one use!
customer_reviews.text: Worked once and when going to use for second time, battery was dead. When attempting to charge, charge light stayed on for about an hour and turned off. Tried to turn on GoPro 5 Sessions and the display screen did not light up. Tried charging again and the charge light come on and went off. Attempted to troubleshoot with reset and firmware update, still did not work. This appears to be an expensive waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mohar

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working less than one month into use
customer_reviews.text: We are taking a road trip on the moto of both coasts of Italy. We wanted to try the camera before leaving, but unfortunately after not even one month of use it doesn't work. Won't turn on, nothing, and got very hot. VERY disappointed, especially because I trusted GoPro!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa DAdamo

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the Session 4 if you use it alot, these are junk
customer_reviews.text: Product fails and locks up regularly, I have 3 of these, 6 hero session 4, and 20+ hero 3+/4. These session 5 cameras will lockup if you are doing multiple clips in succession for video (also lock up for pictures at 1/second). They will corrupt expensive micro SD cards, and also destroy them (render them unusable (can't mount card or even re-initialize card via Mac or PC). Trying to get service through GoPro is troublesome at best, they just want you to keep updating firmware even though it doesn't work. I also know many people with the session 5 having problems. Will be returning them
customer_reviews.author: T. Church

customer_reviews.title: Every body loves gopro
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a gopro. The quality of video that they shoot. I only needed them for extreme and traveling because they are small and easy to operate. I think still they are one of the best action cameras in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Re-G Tromp

customer_reviews.title: ... camera for a while now and it is incredibly useful. Makes a great helmet mounted camera for various ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for a while now and it is incredibly useful. Makes a great helmet mounted camera for various sporting activities and a great dash cam in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Michael LaValley

customer_reviews.title: A Lot Of Weak Points
customer_reviews.text: There’s a myriad of things that can and should be improved. The sound quality and battery life for starters. Also, despite the FPS and 4k, the photo and video quality still isn’t THAT great.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: Took on a trip zip lining and worked awesome. Took it out rafting and got it soaked, no prob. Was a refurbished and came like new. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: (Better colors better accessories) Connecting an external mic requested me a gopro ...
customer_reviews.text: For what it cost I was expecting a little more. (Better colors better accessories) Connecting an external mic requested me a gopro plug bigger then the camera. Very nice under the water.
customer_reviews.author: alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Small and Lite, Just the way I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my need, the big issue is no directive instructions on how to use withs IOS Apple phones (8) and laptop (pro). So far trial and error with mostly error...
customer_reviews.author: ERW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 299, but is worth 199
customer_reviews.text: It takes great video and photos. Some of the features, like voice commands, are just gimmy and are never used. Although the wifi is a good option for setting up shots, it really eats into the already limited and non switchable battery. For 200-250 its not a bad purchase, but I got it at 299. And that was a little too much for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, low battery life
customer_reviews.text: The camera is small, easy to use, it can go underwater without the use of a case. Unfortunately, the battery doesn't lasts for long shooting periods. So if you're outdoors all day, you better take a powerbank with you, otherwise you'll be out of power before long.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Function and quality over price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Little overpriced I think but it’s what you get for quality. Unlike other action cameras that are a bit cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gower

customer_reviews.title: Need a sd card to work and didn’t say
customer_reviews.text: If you want to surprise your kids or make a gift... buy a SD card or they won’t be able to use it. Small and probably good... but complicated to start off with
customer_reviews.author: caribshopper

customer_reviews.title: This is the best GoPro ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the best GoPro they make. Sure there are GoPro's that technically take better photos/video (slightly better), however the form factor and the instant access to start recording make this the best GoPro ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good camera lacking in a few areas leaves me underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good video camera but seriously lacking in certain areas like night time lapse.
customer_reviews.author: BRL82

customer_reviews.title: Overheating
customer_reviews.text: I am still thinking wether this is good or not because the first one that I bought was deffective and now this one over heat after 15minutes using it but I am trying it 1more day I am going to come back and write a review again if it change.
customer_reviews.author: Frida

customer_reviews.title: Great to record every memory
customer_reviews.text: First time to use GoPro. I wish I had it long time ago. Great to record every memory. I recorded 100 GB of videos in Boracay, Philippine earlier this month. I was so happy I chose the GoPro HERO5 Session because of the voice command feature.
customer_reviews.author: Majid Dajani

customer_reviews.title: Loooks like i waste my money in this item
customer_reviews.text: Work a few times and stop working, Red light still ON, overheating and not power, , Loooks like i waste my money in this item.
customer_reviews.author: armando chavarro

customer_reviews.title: Why no more session!!??
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit atop my race drone. Killer video, shame it's on it's way out of the line up. Come on go pro!!! Whyyyyyyy!!!????
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality but camera gets very hot when recording ...
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality but camera gets very hot when recording in 4K. I read in other reviews that is a drawback for GoPro, reason for my return.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is horrible. Gets hot
customer_reviews.text: This products battery is ridiculous. Wish it had swappable batteries. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. The app sucks. The camera is hard to use. It’s a sports camera. It should be simple to use. I should have returned the stupid thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Hero5 Session
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera that works well as a stand-alone camera and on my FPV quad.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Clay

customer_reviews.title: Just love it. I bought this with set of band ...
customer_reviews.text: Just love it. I bought this with set of band which make the gopro able to be worn anywhere on the body. This makes it an even more versatile device.
customer_reviews.author: STEMSVG

customer_reviews.title: Hero 5
customer_reviews.text: Great product just wish I bought the camera so I can see what I was taking pictures of
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Included GoPro Mount broke after few months.
customer_reviews.text: Included GoPro mount broke after few months. Very disappointed. Unfortunately I didn't get warranty so I had to purchase the GoPro Grab Bag of mounts to replace the broken mount. As can be seen from the photos, the part that broke off is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Extreme portability. Took me a while to become comfortable with navigation. The learning curves are all mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy RobyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: New is not always better
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the Original Session felt sturdier and easier to use. I couldn't put my finger on it. But it works almost the same. It's too bad this was discontinued. It's works great on motorcycles.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I love this GoPro but my only issue is we had ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this GoPro but my only issue is we had a hard time turning it off after using it for a while. The quality of video is amazing and we were able to capture so much on our honeymoon, but turning it off was an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shanafelt

product_meta.title: GoPro Hero5 Session
product_meta.description: Style:GoProThe stunning 4K video and one-button design of Hero5 Session may be the ultimate combination of performance and simplicity. Loaded with pro-quality capture features, it’s also a connected GoPro that makes it easy to access, edit and share on any device. To Charge your Camera: use usb cable and a computer or charge device manufactured by gopro. If your camera freezes, press and hold the menu button for about eight seconds until your camera powers off. This reset saves all of your content and settings. The temperature icon and camera too hot appear on the camera status screen when the camera becomes too hot and needs to cool down. Simply let it sit and cool before attempting to use it again. Your camera was designed to identify conditions of overheating and shuts down when needed. Please note that this camera will not operate as described in cold weather and doesn’t include an SD card. Battery Life: GoPro estimates a battery life of two hours for the Hero 5 running at 1080p at 50fps, with GPS, Wi-Fi, voice control and image stabilization off. Depends on the usage. Capture your life as you’ve never seen it with Hero5 Session.
feature_bullets: The GoPro Hero 5 session includes: Hero5 session camera, standard frame, curved adhesive mount, flat adhesive mount, mounting buckle, and an USB c cable; Waterproof to 33 feet (10meter) without a housing; does not include sd card

Make sure your GoPro is charged; To charge your camera, use USB cable and a computer or charge device manufactured by GoPro; If your camera freezes, press and hold the menu button for about eight seconds until your camera powers off; This reset saves all of your content and settings
Additional GoPro Hero5 session features + benefits below on item page; Photos are captured at 10 mp with a 4:3 aspect ratio
A single press of the shutter button powers the camera on and starts recording automatically
Refer user manual and installation manual below for software update instructions; Operating system compatibility: MAC, PC
